sentences.en: Are you planning to attach a train to it?
sentences.cn: 准备加拖地裙摆 吗 ?

sentences.en: Attach a recent photograph to your application form.
Attach the coupon to the front of your letter.
sentences.cn: 把优惠券附在信的正面。

sentences.en: China will not attach itself to any big power.
Don't attach any extravagant hope to it.
For further information, please contact us on the attached form.
sentences.cn: 如需更多信息，请凭附表联系我们。

sentences.en: He would attach a cable around the chassis of the car and winch it up on to the canal bank.
sentences.cn: 他会把钢丝绳拴在汽车底盘上，用卷扬机把汽车吊到运河岸上。

sentences.en: I do not attach much weight to the theory.
Ink particles attach themselves to air bubbles and rise to the surface.
sentences.cn: 墨汁颗粒附着在气泡上，浮到表面上。

sentences.en: It is possible to attach executable program files to e-mail.
sentences.cn: 可以在电子邮件里附上可执行程序文件。

sentences.en: It’s easy to become attached to the children you work with.
sentences.cn: 你很容易就会喜欢上工作中接触到的孩子。

sentences.en: Magistrates will be able to attach conditions when juveniles are remanded.
sentences.cn: 地方法官将可以在少年犯送押时提出附加条件。

sentences.en: People in general attach too much importance to words.
sentences.cn: 人们往往把话语看得太重要.

sentences.en: Please attach these labels to your hand luggages.
sentences.cn: 请把这些标签系在您的手提行李上。

sentences.en: The old man didn't seem to attach any importance to the question.
sentences.cn: 这老人似乎一点也不重视这个问题.

sentences.en: Use the crocodile clips to attach the cables to the battery.
sentences.cn: 用鳄鱼嘴夹把电缆接到蓄电池上。

sentences.en: We attach labels to things before we file them away.
sentences.cn: 存档前，我们先贴上标签。

sentences.en: When approving a merger, the commission can attach conditions.
sentences.cn: 委员会在批准公司合并时可能附加条件。

sentences.en: With the skin gone , to what can the hair attach itself?
sentences.cn: 皮之不存, 毛将焉附?

words.tran_cn: 可附上的；可连接的；可逮捕的；可没收的
附加的；依恋的，充满爱心的
附件；依恋；连接物；扣押财产

trans.tran_cn: 把…固定，附上，附加，缠着，重视，附属，赋予，有关系
trans.tran_en: If you attach something to an object, you join it or fasten it to the object

trans.tran_cn: 系， 贴， 连接； 附加； 使依恋， 使喜爱； 认为有； 使附属
trans.tran_en: to fasten or connect one object to another
